MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH43 postcode area of Walkerburn, affecting properties in Park Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.12pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Hall Street substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.05pm on Saturday 24th April 2021.
